data.title: Sarah Jessica Parker Lands Lead Role in New Film
data.meta_description: Sarah Jessica Parker, the stage and screen star best known for her work in the long-running HBO series "Sex and the City," has landed the leading role in the new film "All Roads Lead to Rome," according to Deadline.com.
data.text:
Principal photography for the romantic comedy is scheduled to begin this month in Italy.

Ella Lemhagen is directing the film; the Swedish director co-wrote the screenplay with Cindy Meyers and Josh Appignanesi.

Parker stars as Maggie, "an uptight American on a road trip throughout Italy with her Italian former lover Luca as they seek out Maggieâ€™s rebellious teenage daughter," according to Deadline.
